formElement.label: Knife Path:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path to the knife executable e.g /usr/bin/knife (This is the default value). (Required)

formElement.label: Configuration File:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path and name of the configuration file e.g /root/.chef/knife.rb (This is the default value). (Required)

formElement.label: Server URL:
formElement.documentation: Provide the URL of the Chef Server to use.

formElement.label: Cookbook Names:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the cookbook(s) to upload, separate them by a space. (Required)

formElement.label: Include All Cookbooks:
formElement.documentation: If checked all cookbooks will be uploaded.

formElement.label: Cookbook Paths:
formElement.documentation: Provide a colon-separated path to look for cookbooks in e.g /etc/chef/cookbooks/:/etc/chef/more_cookbooks.

formElement.label: Include Dependencies:
formElement.documentation: If checked indicates that when a cookbook has a dependency on one or more other cookbooks, those cookbooks will also be uploaded.

formElement.label: Verbose:
formElement.documentation: If checked a more verbose output is showed.

formElement.label: Additional Commands:
formElement.documentation: Provide any additional commands if needed.
